DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Symptom First Onset Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year of the first onset date of the disease symptom.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Symptom First Onset
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._The start, beginning, or early stages. (NCI)

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:An indication that a person has a condition or disease.  Some examples of symptoms are headache, fever, fatigue, nausea, vomiting, and pain.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
Subjective evidence of disease perceived by the patient.

Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The start, beginning, or early stages. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.
The start, beginning, or early stages.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.
